questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with below provided image.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
confirm is there any physical Damage of the Equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230

videos.src: assets/videos/Abott I Stat 1/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET

questions.question: shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power Adaptor and confirm whether it is defective
replace the power adaptor with a new one
repair or replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether “Battery low” message appears on display
change the batteries with a new one
check and confirm whether “ analyzer interrupted, use another cartridge” error appears on display
check and confirm whether the battery pack is inserted properly
insert the battery pack properly
replace or recharge the battery accordingly
check and confirm whether the “Cartridge not inserted” error appears even after placing the cartridge.
place another cartridge carefully and confirm whether the error still appears
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from sample reader to control board
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair or replace the sample reader accordingly
check and confirm whether the result are not displayed after reading the sample
place another cartridge and confirm whether the error still appears.
repair or replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is blank.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from display to control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair or replace the display accordingly
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for further assistance through video call.
Thanks
